title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.10 - Aviation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.10 - Aviation

State Regulations

No person shall voluntarily bring, land or cause to alight
within or upon any park, any airplane, balloon, parachute, hang glider, or
other aerial device, except that certain areas may be designated appropriate
landing places for medical evacuation helicopters. For the purposes of this
section, voluntarily shall mean anything other than a forced landing caused by
mechanical or structural failure of the aircraft or other aerial
device. Notes

9003.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
